revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Snowpoint Temple |image = [[File:Snowpoint Temple.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Snowpoint Temple. |tokens = 96,500 |location = East of Snowpoint City. }} '''Snowpoint Temple''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 2,203,000 |- | Jynx (Boss) || 8,000,000 |- | Regigigas (Boss) || 9,000,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Golbat * Sneasel * Smoochum * Jynx (boss) * Regigigas (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} [[Item Magnet]] || 50% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
